panels.description:
当前可用（新车）是指电池当前的预估容量。为了获得更准确的估算，它是基于最近10次充电会话中报告的预估容量的平均值。（不包含充至100%）

如果你在这里只看到“1.0 kWh”，这意味着你需要至少进行一次长时间的充电会话。

可用电量（现在）是指自你开始使用Teslamate以来电池的预估容量。因此，你从新车中记录的数据越多，估算结果就越好。对于那些自从购买新车以来就没有使用过Teslamate的人，或者购买的是二手车的人，可以通过将最大续航里程设置为100%，并输入新车电池的新电池容量，来获得更准确和精确的估算。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  
  CASE WHEN $custom_kwh_new > 0 THEN $custom_kwh_new ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxCapacity')::float END as "可用容量 (新)", 
  ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float as "可用容量 (现在)",
  ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float - CASE WHEN $custom_kwh_new > 0 THEN $custom_kwh_new ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxCapacity')::float END as "差值"

panels.title: 电池容量

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  
  CASE WHEN $custom_max_range > 0 THEN $custom_max_range ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxRange')::float END as "最大续航",
  ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentRange')::float  as "当前续航",
  CASE WHEN $custom_max_range > 0 THEN $custom_max_range ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxRange')::float END - ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentRange')::float as "续航损失"

panels.description:
在 Teslamate 数据库中，「系统记录里程」是指保存的行驶里程。「车辆行驶里程」则指的是自从开始使用 Teslamate 以来，车辆行驶的总里程。

因此，如果这两个数值之间存在差异，则表示由于某些原因，部分行驶里程没有被完整记录下来。例如，可能出现程序错误、意外重启导致 Teslamate 无法记录数据，也可能是因为网络连接不畅、信号缺失或 Teslamate 停运等原因。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ROUND(convert_km((max(end_km) - min(start_km))::numeric, '$length_unit'),0)|| ' $length_unit' AS "里程"
FROM drives WHERE car_id = $car_id;

SELECT ROUND(convert_km(max(end_km)::numeric, '$length_unit'),0) || ' $length_unit' AS "里程表"
FROM drives WHERE car_id =  $car_id;

SELECT (
 (SELECT ROUND(convert_km((max(end_km) - min(start_km))::numeric, '$length_unit'),0) FROM drives WHERE car_id = $car_id) - 
 (SELECT ROUND(convert_km(sum(distance)::numeric, '$length_unit'),0) from drives where car_id = $car_id) || ' $length_unit'
)
AS "数据丢失(未记录)"

panels.title: 行程统计

targets.rawSql:
WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id AS "充电进程ID",
		cp.charge_energy_added AS "充电量增加",
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current,
		cp.charge_energy_used AS "充电使用能量"
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	SUM(GREATEST(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

panels.title: 交流/直流电量使用汇总

panels.description:
这个仪表盘的基于Teslamate记录的数据评估的电池健康度。因此从新车开始记录的数据越多内容越准确。

衰减只是一个估计值，仅用于参考，根据车辆的额定效率，通过每次充电过程中可用电池电量的测量来计算，确保充入足够的电量（以避免样本中的不准确数据）。

targets.rawSql: SELECT GREATEST(0, 100.0 - (('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float * 100.0 / CASE WHEN $custom_kwh_new > 0 THEN $custom_kwh_new ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxCapacity')::float END))

panels.title: 预估衰减

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  
  LEAST(100, (100 - GREATEST(0, 100.0 - (('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float * 100.0 / CASE WHEN $custom_kwh_new > 0 THEN $custom_kwh_new ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxCapacity')::float END)))) as "电池健康度(%)"

panels.description: 预估的充电周期是基于向电池充入的总能量。因此，您记录的数据越多，结果就越准确。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	COUNT(*) AS "充电次数"
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	floor(sum(charge_energy_added) / CASE WHEN $custom_kwh_new > 0 THEN $custom_kwh_new ELSE ('$aux'::json ->> 'MaxCapacity')::float END) AS "充电周期数"
FROM charging_processes WHERE car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	sum(charge_energy_added) as "总充电量"
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	SUM(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS "总耗电量"
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	SUM(charge_energy_added) / SUM(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS "充电效率"
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

panels.title: 电池统计

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM ((SELECT usable_battery_level, date
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
(SELECT usable_battery_level, date
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE p.car_id = $car_id AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)) AS last_usable_battery_level LIMIT 1

SELECT
  0 as lowest,
  20 as lower,
  CASE WHEN lfp_battery THEN 100 ELSE 81 END as upper
from cars inner join car_settings on cars.settings_id = car_settings.id
where cars.id = $car_id

panels.description:
这是 TeslaMate 根据电池充电情况计算得出的“推导额定效率” 
您可以在 "能效" 仪表板上查看更多详细信息

targets.rawSql: SELECT ('$aux'::json ->> 'RatedEfficiency')::float * 10 / convert_km(1, '$length_unit') AS efficiency_$length_unit

panels.title: 能耗

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM ((SELECT usable_battery_level * ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float / 100 as kWh, date, ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float as Total
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id  AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
(SELECT battery_level * ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float / 100 as kWh, date, ('$aux'::json ->> 'CurrentCapacity')::float as Total
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE p.car_id = $car_id  AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)) AS last_usable_battery_level LIMIT 1

SELECT convert_km(AVG(p.odometer)::numeric,'$length_unit') AS "里程表", 
	AVG(c.rated_battery_range_km * ('$aux'::json ->> 'RatedEfficiency')::float / c.usable_battery_level) AS "千瓦时",
	--MAX(cp.id) AS id,
	to_char(timezone('$__timezone', timezone('UTC', cp.end_date)), 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS "日期"
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date	FROM charges WHERE usable_battery_level > 0 GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges	ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
		INNER JOIN positions p ON p.id = cp.position_id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.charge_energy_added >= ('$aux'::json ->> 'RatedEfficiency')::float
	GROUP BY 3

SELECT 
  ROUND(MIN(convert_km(p.odometer::numeric,'$length_unit')),0) AS "里程表",
	ROUND(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY c.rated_battery_range_km * ('$aux'::json ->> 'RatedEfficiency')::float / c.usable_battery_level)::numeric,1) AS "千瓦时",
	to_char(timezone('$__timezone', timezone('UTC', cp.end_date)), 'YYYYMM') || CASE WHEN to_char(timezone('$__timezone', timezone('UTC', cp.end_date)), 'DD')::int <= 15 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END  AS Title
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date	FROM charges WHERE usable_battery_level > 0 GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges	ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
		INNER JOIN positions p ON p.id = cp.position_id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.charge_energy_added >= ('$aux'::json ->> 'RatedEfficiency')::float
	GROUP BY 3

panels.title: 电池容量 - 按里程表

list.definition:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC
list.label: 车辆
list.name: car_id
list.query:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC

list.definition:
WITH Aux as (
    SELECT 
        car_id,
        COALESCE(derived_efficiency, car_efficiency) AS efficiency
    FROM (
        SELECT
            ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 AS derived_efficiency,
            COUNT(*) as count,
            cars.id as car_id,
            cars.efficiency * 100 AS car_efficiency
        FROM cars
            LEFT JOIN charging_processes ON
                cars.id = charging_processes.car_id 
                AND duration_min > 10
                AND end_battery_level <= 95
                AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
                AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
                AND charge_energy_added > 0
        WHERE cars.id = $car_id
        GROUP BY 1, 3, 4
        ORDER BY 2 DESC
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS Efficiency
),

CurrentCapacity AS (
    SELECT
        AVG(Capacity) AS Capacity
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            c.rated_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity
        FROM charging_processes cp
            INNER JOIN charges c ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
            INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
        WHERE
            cp.car_id = $car_id
            AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
            AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
            AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
        ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC, c.date desc
        LIMIT 100
    ) AS lastCharges
),

MaxCapacity AS (
    SELECT 
        MAX(c.rated_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level) AS Capacity
    FROM charging_processes cp
        INNER JOIN (
            SELECT
                charging_process_id,
                MAX(date) as date FROM charges WHERE usable_battery_level > 0 GROUP BY charging_process_id
        ) AS gcharges ON
            cp.id = gcharges.charging_process_id
        INNER JOIN charges c ON
            c.charging_process_id = cp.id
            AND c.date = gcharges.date
        INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
    WHERE
        cp.car_id = $car_id
        AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
        AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
),

CurrentRange AS (
    SELECT
        (range * 100.0 / usable_battery_level) AS range
    FROM (
        (
            SELECT
                date,
                ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km AS range,
                usable_battery_level AS usable_battery_level
            FROM positions
            WHERE
                car_id = $car_id
                AND ideal_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
                AND usable_battery_level > 0 
            ORDER BY date DESC
            LIMIT 1
        )
        UNION ALL
        (
            SELECT date,
                ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km AS range,
                usable_battery_level as usable_battery_level
            FROM charges c
                INNER JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
            WHERE
                p.car_id = $car_id
                AND usable_battery_level > 0
            ORDER BY date DESC
            LIMIT 1
        )
    ) AS data
    ORDER BY date DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

MaxRange AS (
    SELECT
        floor(extract(epoch from date)/86400)*86400 AS time,
        CASE
            WHEN sum(usable_battery_level) = 0 THEN sum(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km) * 100
            ELSE sum(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km) / sum(usable_battery_level) * 100
        END AS range
    FROM (
        SELECT
            battery_level,
            usable_battery_level,
            date,
            ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km
        FROM charges c 
            INNER JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
        WHERE
            p.car_id = $car_id
            AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL
    ) AS data
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

Base AS (
    SELECT NULL
)

SELECT
    json_build_object(
        'MaxRange', convert_km(MaxRange.range,'$length_unit'),
        'CurrentRange', convert_km(CurrentRange.range,'$length_unit'),
        'MaxCapacity', MaxCapacity.Capacity,
        'CurrentCapacity', CASE WHEN CurrentCapacity.Capacity IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE CurrentCapacity.Capacity END,
        'RatedEfficiency', aux.efficiency
    )
FROM Base
    LEFT JOIN MaxRange ON true
    LEFT JOIN CurrentRange ON true
    LEFT JOIN Aux ON true
    LEFT JOIN MaxCapacity ON true
    LEFT JOIN CurrentCapacity ON true
list.name: aux
list.query:
WITH Aux as (
    SELECT 
        car_id,
        COALESCE(derived_efficiency, car_efficiency) AS efficiency
    FROM (
        SELECT
            ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 AS derived_efficiency,
            COUNT(*) as count,
            cars.id as car_id,
            cars.efficiency * 100 AS car_efficiency
        FROM cars
            LEFT JOIN charging_processes ON
                cars.id = charging_processes.car_id 
                AND duration_min > 10
                AND end_battery_level <= 95
                AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
                AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
                AND charge_energy_added > 0
        WHERE cars.id = $car_id
        GROUP BY 1, 3, 4
        ORDER BY 2 DESC
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS Efficiency
),

CurrentCapacity AS (
    SELECT
        AVG(Capacity) AS Capacity
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            c.rated_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity
        FROM charging_processes cp
            INNER JOIN charges c ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
            INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
        WHERE
            cp.car_id = $car_id
            AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
            AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
            AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
        ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC, c.date desc
        LIMIT 100
    ) AS lastCharges
),

MaxCapacity AS (
    SELECT 
        MAX(c.rated_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level) AS Capacity
    FROM charging_processes cp
        INNER JOIN (
            SELECT
                charging_process_id,
                MAX(date) as date FROM charges WHERE usable_battery_level > 0 GROUP BY charging_process_id
        ) AS gcharges ON
            cp.id = gcharges.charging_process_id
        INNER JOIN charges c ON
            c.charging_process_id = cp.id
            AND c.date = gcharges.date
        INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
    WHERE
        cp.car_id = $car_id
        AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
        AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
),

CurrentRange AS (
    SELECT
        (range * 100.0 / usable_battery_level) AS range
    FROM (
        (
            SELECT
                date,
                ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km AS range,
                usable_battery_level AS usable_battery_level
            FROM positions
            WHERE
                car_id = $car_id
                AND ideal_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
                AND usable_battery_level > 0 
            ORDER BY date DESC
            LIMIT 1
        )
        UNION ALL
        (
            SELECT date,
                ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km AS range,
                usable_battery_level as usable_battery_level
            FROM charges c
                INNER JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
            WHERE
                p.car_id = $car_id
                AND usable_battery_level > 0
            ORDER BY date DESC
            LIMIT 1
        )
    ) AS data
    ORDER BY date DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

MaxRange AS (
    SELECT
        floor(extract(epoch from date)/86400)*86400 AS time,
        CASE
            WHEN sum(usable_battery_level) = 0 THEN sum(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km) * 100
            ELSE sum(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km) / sum(usable_battery_level) * 100
        END AS range
    FROM (
        SELECT
            battery_level,
            usable_battery_level,
            date,
            ${preferred_range}_battery_range_km
        FROM charges c 
            INNER JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
        WHERE
            p.car_id = $car_id
            AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL
    ) AS data
    GROUP BY 1
    ORDER BY 2 DESC
    LIMIT 1
),

Base AS (
    SELECT NULL
)

SELECT
    json_build_object(
        'MaxRange', convert_km(MaxRange.range,'$length_unit'),
        'CurrentRange', convert_km(CurrentRange.range,'$length_unit'),
        'MaxCapacity', MaxCapacity.Capacity,
        'CurrentCapacity', CASE WHEN CurrentCapacity.Capacity IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE CurrentCapacity.Capacity END,
        'RatedEfficiency', aux.efficiency
    )
FROM Base
    LEFT JOIN MaxRange ON true
    LEFT JOIN CurrentRange ON true
    LEFT JOIN Aux ON true
    LEFT JOIN MaxCapacity ON true
    LEFT JOIN CurrentCapacity ON true

list.description: 如果您是购买新车时就通过Teslamate记录数据，请保持默认设置为0，健康度将根据Teslamate中记录的数据进行计算；如果您是在使用了一段时间车辆后才使用Teslamate记录数据，请设置您的车辆电池初始容量，健康度将根据您设置的初始容量进行计算。
list.label: 自定义新车电池容量(度)
list.name: custom_kwh_new

list.description: 如果您是购买新车时就通过Teslamate记录数据，请保持默认设置为0，健康度将根据Teslamate中记录的数据进行计算；如果您是在使用了一段时间车辆后才使用Teslamate记录数据，请设置您的车辆出厂续航里程，健康度将根据您设置的初始里程进行计算。
list.label: 自定义新车最大续航里程
list.name: custom_max_range
